theRetrospect:DefaultUncommonSkill.NAME: A Better Defend
theRetrospect:DefaultUncommonSkill.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Plated Armor. Affected by Dexterity.

theRetrospect:DefaultRareSkill.NAME: For Each Loop x2
theRetrospect:DefaultRareSkill.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Vulnerable to all enemies, 2 times.
theRetrospect:DefaultRareSkill.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Vulnerable to all enemies, 3 times.

theRetrospect:DefaultRarePower.NAME: In-Progress Form
theRetrospect:DefaultRarePower.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, play a TOUCH.

theRetrospect:DefaultAttackWithVariable.NAME: Special Strike
theRetrospect:DefaultAttackWithVariable.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage [E] times. NL (Deal !theRetrospect:ENERGY_DAMAGE! damage total.)

theRetrospect:DefaultSecondMagicNumberSk.NAME: Cool 2 Number Card
theRetrospect:DefaultSecondMagicNumberSk.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Vulnerable and !theRetrospect:SecondMagic! poison to an enemy.
